Uses of Class
umontreal.iro.lecuyer.stochprocess.BrownianMotion

  • Packages that use BrownianMotion 
    Package Description
    umontreal.iro.lecuyer.stochprocess  

    • Uses of BrownianMotion in umontreal.iro.lecuyer.stochprocess

      Subclasses of BrownianMotion in umontreal.iro.lecuyer.stochprocess 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BrownianMotionBridge
      Represents a Brownian motion process {X(t) : t >= 0} sampled using the bridge sampling technique (see for example).
      class  BrownianMotionPCA
      A Brownian motion process {X(t) : t >= 0} sampled using the principal component decomposition (PCA).
      class  BrownianMotionPCAEqualSteps
      Same as BrownianMotionPCA, but uses a trick to speed up the calculation when the time steps are equidistant.
      Fields in umontreal.iro.lecuyer.stochprocess declared as BrownianMotion 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected BrownianMotion GeometricBrownianMotion.bm 
      protected BrownianMotion VarianceGammaProcess.BM 
      Methods in umontreal.iro.lecuyer.stochprocess that return BrownianMotion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BrownianMotion VarianceGammaProcess.getBrownianMotion()
      Returns a reference to the inner BrownianMotion.
      BrownianMotion GeometricBrownianMotion.getBrownianMotion()
      Returns a reference to the BrownianMotion object used to generate the process.
      BrownianMotion InverseGaussianProcessPCA.getBrownianMotionPCA()
      Returns the BrownianMotionPCA.
      Constructors in umontreal.iro.lecuyer.stochprocess with parameters of type BrownianMotion 
      Constructor and Description
      GeometricBrownianMotion(double s0, double mu, double sigma, BrownianMotion bm)
      Constructs a new GeometricBrownianMotion with parameters μ = mu, σ = sigma, and S(t0) = s0, using bm as the underlying BrownianMotion.
      VarianceGammaProcess(double s0, BrownianMotion BM, GammaProcess Gamma)
      Constructs a new VarianceGammaProcess.
